meta.title: Faye Computer Systems — AI Integration for Business
meta.description: We audit your workflows, build automation, and hand it over. Practical AI systems for businesses.

hero.headline: We automate what slows you down
hero.subheadline: We spot what wastes your time and automate it.

services.title: How we work
services.subtitle: From audit to handover, three steps.

audit.title: 1. Audit
audit.description: We map your workflows, flag what can be automated, and deliver a ranked action plan.

build.title: 2. Build
build.description: Custom APIs, AI agents, and pipelines — built on top of your current stack.

transfer.title: 3. Transfer
transfer.description: We document everything, train your team, and hand over the keys. It's yours.

philosophy.heading: Built around <accent>how you already work</accent>
philosophy.body: We watch how your team actually works, find where time leaks, and automate those exact steps.

secure.title: Secure and local-first
secure.description: Your data stays yours. We run on-premise when it matters.

control.title: Your team stays in control
control.description: AI handles the volume. Your people make the calls.

compound.title: Gains that stack
compound.description: Each automation runs daily. The value adds up.
